Author: RedMakeupBag98
Text: That’s literally so unprofessional she needs to fuck off and not be commenting about your body in the workplace

Author: my-destructive-side
Text: “My weight is not an appropriate topic of conversation, and I’d appreciate it if everyone here would refrain on commenting on it from this point on.”  If that fails, HR.  If there is no HR, making rude snarky comments in response is probably not the most mature or professional response, but 🤷🏼‍♀️
